attributes.action: Offical recognition for the following members of society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that Stephen Cullen, Michael Conlon and Jonathan Boyd should be honoured regarding their extensive attempts to improve diplomatic relations with the people of France and Belguim during trips there in recent years. They have hepled create a positve image of Northern Ireland through their 'craic' in various establishments, entertaining locals and tourists alike with their wit and self-deprecating homour.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
